text: Hagi kahefa vahe'mota, anahukna hutma ugagota huramantenesaza ra vahe'mokizmi naneke antahizmita zamage anteho. Maka'motma anterami tamavu'tamavara kukena hiaza nehutma, rumokizmi zamagorga umani emani hiho. Tamage huno avontafemo'a anage hu'ne, Zamagra zamavufgama erisaga haza vahera Anumzamo'a ha'renezamanteno, zamavufgama anteramiza mani'naza vahera knare hunezmante.  (Pro-Knare nomaniza 3:34)
